Package com.converter.csvconverter.DataBaseHandler

Class DDBHandler

java.lang.Object
com.converter.csvconverter.DataBaseHandler.DDBHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataBaseHandler
public class DDBHandler extends Object implements DataBaseHandler
DynamoDB implementation of the DataBaseHandler interface (WORK IN PROGRESS).

The DDBHandler class implements the methods defined in the DataBaseHandler interface for handling database operations specific to DynamoDB. It provides functionality to build DDL statements, batch insert data, create tables, upload data, and configure the DynamoDB connection.
